summary: A light color scheme for coders whom also read newspapers
name: newspaper.vim
description:
a 1st attempt for a light/subtle, easy to read scheme, especially for extended periods of coding...

Screenshot:
http://www.flickr.com/photos/28853165@N05/5225392098/
install_details: just drop newspaper.vim in your vim/colors directory

versions.release_notes: reworked the colors as hex codes
